basics.name: Kyle Oliver
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer with 6 years of Professional experience including data pipelines, game dev, medical robotics, cloud services, and more. Recently have been focusing on improving dev workflows and application development through a mixture of Python and Rust.

work.summary: Developed data-centric Python architectures, while also pushing forward better development standards and processes.
work.name: Kinetic Vision
highlights: Worked on data collection and transportation for medical robotics testing.
Wrote a computer vision package for informing liquid area coverage on a 3D geometry.
Created an ML pipeline for checking for errors in a 3D voxel.
Created project templates and helped develop better inhouse Python standards.
Created an ML pipeline for measuring void coefficient from cat scans in a defined geometry.
Created a Python package for interfacing with GCP, along with automating GCP setup through Terraform.

work.summary: Added new features and fixed existing bugs using test driven development in a Python, Pyramid, and SQLAlchemy stack. Additionally, created a schema caching system that was responsible for cutting load times down to a fraction of their original times.
work.name: SlashDB
highlights: Worked as a full stack developer on a Python Pyramid application.
Improved test coverage, and refactored existing code.
Fixed issues and debugged various SQL interfaces and edge cases.
Added to the angular front end and designed new interfaces.

work.summary: Worked as one of the core developers for Custom Hero Clash, a Dota 2 custom game that has around 1.2 million players. I was responsible mostly for the backend Lua code relating to core gameplay mechanics.
work.name: Arcadia Redux (Dota 2 Unofficial)
work.position: Dota 2 Custom Game Developer - Arcadia Redux (Dota 2 Unofficial)
highlights: Ensured consistent and stable changes for a large community of 1.2 Million players
Surveyed consumers and translated feedback into product changes
Adapted to a custom interface for Lua on the go.

work.summary: Automated a large portion of the accounting through Quickbooks as to the specifications set by the accounting department. Additionally estimated and communicated needed time for desired features.
work.name: Brands Insurance
highlights: Created a Ruby Gem for integrating into an existing Rails application.
Created an interface for automating entry of an existing database into Quickbooks.

interests.name: EMG / Neural Interface research and development
